name: Souls Rest
description:
Plot: A young man named Avi Otus is called to the old house by his Aunt. He looks to find her and figure out whats going on in this Gameboy game. 

Features:

  1. multiple random events.
  2.  jump scares.
  3. A cat.
  4. Talk with death (if you can find him)
  5. A custom color pallet when playing online or on a gameboy color.
  6. you can download the rom for play via emulators [available once enough  bugs are worked out that it's reasonably playable..]

This is the first game I've made in GB Studio.

I'm still fixing a few bugs and glitches as well as issues with audio. if you spot one please feel free to let me know so I can fix it.
